caption.p: Effect of EOs from Foeniculum vulgare Miller (FV) ( A), Calamintha nepeta (L.) Savi subsp. glandulosa (Req.) Ball (CG) ( B), and Ridolfia segetum Moris (RS) ( C) on biofilm formation of P. aeruginosa PaO1. Data are reported as percentage of residual biofilm after the treatment in comparison with the untreated one. Each data point is composed of four independent experiments each performed at least in triplicate.
